bug.author: manishthani
bug.summary: Tire friction when applying physics control
bug.description: Carla Version: 0.9.4 Python Version: 2.7.12 and 3.5.2 Unreal Version: 4.21 When applying the physics control to a vehicles, the Tire friction parameter of the wheels updates all vehicles friction and this new value is stored until server is running. It would be better if it only affects the selected vehicle and without storing the new value in the TireConfig UDataAsset in Unreal Engine.
